if [ -z "$NOCOLOR" ]; then
	# assuming this terminal supports ANSI escape sequences
	#
	. /etc/init.d/functions-ansi.in
else
	# if not, use plain text
	#

	banner() {
		echo "$*"
	}

	title() {
		echo -n "$* ..."
		error=0
	}

	status() {
		if [ "${1:-$error}" -eq 0 ]; then
			echo " OK"
		else
			echo " FAIL"
		fi
	}
fi

# flow functions don't change
#
check() {
	"$@" || error=$?
}

action() {
	title "$1"
	shift
	"$@" || error=$?
	status
}
